source:
TEXT_LUCKZF003_03462_SEQ_00 Quest Sync
Lanille looks expectantly into the woods, as if waiting for someone.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZF003_03462_SEQ_00特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト
ファノヴの里のラニルは、仲間の帰りを心配しているようだ。
TEXT_LUCKZF003_03462_TODO_01<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61EAB6101 /var>に向かって「祈る」をする

source:
TEXT_LUCKZF003_03462_LANILLE_000_001Gods...that girl never listens...!?
Oh! It is you. How much of my grumbling did you hear?
target:
TEXT_LUCKZF003_03462_LANILLE_000_001ふぅ……またあの子は……。
おや、ため息を聞かれてしまったようだな。

source: TEXT_LUCKZF003_03462_LANILLE_000_002<tab>An elder's torment knows no end. I sent my niece out to gather branches for a bow, but she has yet to return. Knowing her pious nature, doubtless she is lost in prayer under some tree or the other.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZF003_03462_LANILLE_000_002実は、弓を作るための枝を授かりに、
森に向かった姪が、一向に帰ってこなくてな。
信心深い彼女のこと、時を忘れて大樹に祈っているのだろう。

source: TEXT_LUCKZF003_03462_LANILLE_000_003<tab>While I would never deny her her faith, she must learn not to neglect her worldly duties. My warnings fall on deaf ears, however. Perhaps you can succeed where I failed. Could you speak with her on my behalf? She is likely somewhere in the Wild Fete.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZF003_03462_LANILLE_000_003伯母の私が何度、小言を言っても聞く様子がない。
同盟者殿、すまないが貴方から声をかけてもらえぬだろうか？
場所は「ワイルドガーデン」にある大樹の前だ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKZF003_03462_LANILLE_000_004<tab>I am at my wit's end, so I must ask for your help. Pray find my niece at the Wild Fete and instruct her to return here at once.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZF003_03462_LANILLE_000_004森に向かった姪が、一向に帰ってこなくてな。
すまないが貴方から声をかけてもらえぬだろうか？
「ワイルドガーデン」にある大樹の付近にいるはずだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZF003_03462_PRAYERFULVIIS03462_000_011<tab>Oh, my apologies, I did not notice you. It is so easy to become lost in my quiet of the wood...
target:
TEXT_LUCKZF003_03462_PRAYERFULVIIS03462_000_011あら、ごめんなさい。
祈りに夢中で……私に何かご用かしら？

source: TEXT_LUCKZF003_03462_PRAYERFULVIIS03462_000_012<tab>What? Lanille sent you? I see... It seems I must apologize for becoming your burden as well.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZF003_03462_PRAYERFULVIIS03462_000_012私を呼ぶために、ラニル伯母様から……？
それは申し訳ないことをしてしまったわね。

source: TEXT_LUCKZF003_03462_PRAYERFULVIIS03462_000_013<tab>However, it would have been remiss of me to return without saying my proper benedictions. After all, a branch is but a gift of the wood, a piece of its life force that we must be grateful for.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZF003_03462_PRAYERFULVIIS03462_000_013でも、弓となる枝を求め、森の命の一部を頂戴するからには、
祈りをおろそかにする訳にもいかないわ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZF003_03462_PRAYERFULVIIS03462_000_014<tab>This tree is said to be blessed by Yx'Maja, goddess of beauty and the hunt. It is only natural that I should say thanks here before receiving the wood's bounty.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZF003_03462_PRAYERFULVIIS03462_000_014この大樹は、美と狩猟を司る女神、
イキス・マヤエの加護を受けた神木と言われているの。
だから、森から恵みを受け取る前に、必ず祈りを捧げるのよ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZF003_03462_PRAYERFULVIIS03462_000_015<tab>Would you care to join me? Ask for the tree's protection, that you might be safeguarded from danger in the journey ahead.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZF003_03462_PRAYERFULVIIS03462_000_015そうだわ！
せっかくだから君も、この先の旅路を見守ってくれるよう、
女神に……この神木に向けて「祈る」といいわ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZF003_03462_PRAYERFULVIIS03462_000_016<tab>Who knows what perils you may face in the future? <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Pray<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> for the blessing of the goddess to set your mind at ease.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZF003_03462_PRAYERFULVIIS03462_000_016せっかくだから君も、この先の旅路を見守ってくれるよう、
女神に……この神木に向けて「祈る」といいわ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZF003_03462_SYSTEM_000_015<tab>The wood is waiting to give its blessing to any who would <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>pray<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> for it.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZF003_03462_SYSTEM_000_015「イキス・マヤエの神木」にエモート「祈る」をして、
森の女神へと祈りを捧げよう。

source: TEXT_LUCKZF003_03462_PRAYERFULVIIS03462_000_020<tab>Very good. Now the goddess shall watch over your every step.
target: TEXT_LUCKZF003_03462_PRAYERFULVIIS03462_000_020<tab>ふふ、これで女神も森を歩む君を見守ってくれるはずよ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZF003_03462_PRAYERFULVIIS03462_000_021<tab>Now, I suppose it is time I seek out a suitable branch. Please tell Lanille that I shall be home soon.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZF003_03462_PRAYERFULVIIS03462_000_021さて、私は弓を作るための枝を探してから帰るわ。
「ラニル」伯母様に、心配しないでと伝えておいてね！

source: TEXT_LUCKZF003_03462_LANILLE_000_030<tab>You have returned. I hope she did not prove too troublesome.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZF003_03462_LANILLE_000_030姪に声をかけてきてくれたようだな。
手数をかけた、礼を言おう。

source: TEXT_LUCKZF003_03462_LANILLE_000_031<tab>So, even a warrior such as you can be convinced to say a humble prayer? Perhaps there is power in her conviction after all. Very well, I too shall pray that the goddess keeps you in good health.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZF003_03462_LANILLE_000_031それにしても、貴方にまで祈りを促すとは、
彼女の信心深さは本物だな。
ともかく、貴方に女神の祝福があるよう、私も祈るとしよう。
